description.en:
Busan, 1936. Yeon Jeong lives her life without fitting in anywhere, until she meets a mermaid by fate. The mermaid tells her that she has come to pick her up as promised, and asks her to follow her to the place where eternal happiness lies.  
  
"Can I be happy there at last, living as myself?

Six months after the fight to the death with The Bog, Kaiji escapes from the underground and pays off his debts. Sakazaki gets fed up with Kaiji and tries to get rid of him by giving him 3 million yen as compensation. At that time, Kaiji is reunited with Miyoshi and Maeda, who were his friends in the underground, and they come up with a plan to swindle a large sum of money from Muraoka, the president of the underground casino where they work. Kaiji takes 3 million yen from Sakazaki, promising to pay it back, and plays a variant of mahjong called "17 Steps" invented by Muraoka.

altTitles.th: ผู้กล้ากับดาบเเสงที่ไม่อาจคาดหวัง

description.en:
Whilst searching for porn on the internet Sudo Kansuke, a 20 year old university student, gets sucked into an RPG world called Munberdia. He is the chosen hero who carries the sword of light! Only the sword of light is not what you would expect…  
  
Note: Volumes 10 and onward do not have a print version, only a kindle version.

title.en: Destroy It All And Love Me In Hell!

altTitles.ja: ぜんぶ壊して地獄で愛して

description.en:
Kurumi Yoshizawa, the student council president, has excellent grades and an inviting, friendly personality… on the surface at least. In reality, her days are spent struggling against her domineering mother and agonizing over her teachers’ expectations.

One day, Kurumi reluctantly goes to meet Naoi, her truant classmate, at her homeroom teacher’s request to look after her. The situation sours quickly as Naoi sees through Kurumi’s facade and makes her animosity clear. On the verge of a meltdown, Kurumi is barely able to stop herself from shoplifting, unaware that she’s being recorded by Naoi…

This is a violent story about two young girls struggling every day with no escape.
description.pl:
Kurumi Yoshizawa, przewodnicząca samorządu uczniowskiego, otwarta, ambitna, życzliwa... a przynajmniej na taką się kreuje. Rzeczywistość wygląda jednak mniej rózowo - w szkole musi zmagać się z nadmiernymi oczekiwaniami nauczycieli, a w domu czeka na nią toksyczna matka.

Pewnego dnia Kurumi, na prośbę wychowawcy, udaje się do Naoi, swojej wagarującej koleżanki z klasy. Sprawy przybierają zupełnie niespodziewany obrót, gdy Naoi dostrzega fasadę Kurumi i jasno wyraża swoją wrogość wobec niej. Będąc na skraju załamania nerwowego, Kurumi powstanawia dokonać drobnej kradzieży, przed czym w ostatniej chwili się powstrzymuje. Nie ma pojęcia, że całe te zajście nagrała Naoi.

To brutalna opowieść o dwóch młodych dziewczynach, które każdego dnia zmagają się z codziennością, od której nie mogą się wyrwać.
description.uk:
Вітайте, Йошізава Курумі – відмінниця, розумниця, красуня, президент школи та просто дуже гарна дівчинка!.. Принаймні такою вона себе показує людям. Реальність прозаїчніша: жорстокі методи виховання матері, відсутність будь-якого вільного часу, море стресу та щира відраза до всіх навколо.
І як часто буває з такими «відмінницями» – накипіло. «Що, якщо я це вкраду? Мене спіймають? Може, тоді цей жах нарешті скінчиться?» – стоїть і думає Курумі, не усвідомлюючи, що її спроба крадіжки записується на відео. Проте її знімають не камери відеоспостереження крамниці, а телефон Наой.
Наой – це дівчина, яка за словами не слідкує, до школи не ходить та обожнює ставити «відмінниць» на місце. Вона бачить абсолютно все крізь маску Курумі, погрожуючи показати відео однокласникам. Для Наой це був хіба що спосіб розвіяти нудьгу та провчити лицемірку… Допоки вона не починає бачити в Курумі лиш одне, але чисте та справжнє спільне бажання.

title.en: It Was Love at First Sight, Mr. Villain!

description.en:
Duke Adler, referred to as the greatest man of the Asgard Empire, is as handsome as a sculpture. However, he is also a serial killer, playing the role of the villain in a novel. On top of that, Princess Charlotte, who was politically married to him, was fated to be murdered on their first night together.

The predicament is that I am the princess fated to die at his hands on that night.

"It's a political marriage, and it's not as if we want to see each other anyway, so let's just meet on our wedding day."

It was evident that the villain was displeased with the idea of marrying me. Hence, I made a decision.

"It was love at first sight. So, please go out with me!"

With only six months left until the wedding, I resolved to carry out an undercover investigation by pretending to date him. People wouldn't believe my words, so I had no choice but to gather evidence myself.

Even though she had planned to reveal the fact that he was a serial killer by hovering around him...

***

"You said you fell in love with me at first sight, so what were you doing here with another man?"

A cold voice flowed into my ears.

"W-What do you mean? I was just dancing to ensure there were no disruptions at the banquet..."

The nape of my neck heated up from the hot breath brushing against the outer edges of my ear. The contrast between his warm touches and the cool tone of his voice intoxicated me even more.

"You called his name so affectionately, as he held you tightly in his arms."
"Gasp."

Unable to escape the strong scent that clouded my senses, I held my breath. My whole body tingled from the strange sensation spreading from my neck to the rest of my body. He tilted his head and said...

"If there's someone else's scent coming from you... I'll have an urge to kill."
In a city overflowing with heinous crimes and violence, two girls make it their job to kill criminals who can not be dealt with by police.

altTitles.th: แวมเพียร์ซ แวมไพร์สุดที่รัก

description.en:
On the day of her grandmother's funeral, Ichika meets Aria, a beautiful foreigner who claims to be her grandmother's friend.
But Ichika soon finds that Aria is no normal human ; she is a vampire, and their relationship has just begun...
description.es: Uma pequena história de amor sobre uma garota e uma vampira.
description.pt-br: As coisas mudam na vida de Ichika no dia em que sua avó morre. No funeral aparecem muitos parentes e conhecidos que só a incomodam com as típicas perguntas sobre se ter ou não um namorado, além de comparações com a avó. Uma garota se destaca entre todos: Aria. Ela parece saber muitas coisas sobre sua família e também vem se despedir dela, conseguindo atrair poderosamente a atenção de Ichika, que imediatamente fica absorvida por ela. O que Ichika não sabe é que Aria é uma vampira e não demorará muito para que ela lhe prove isso...

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

title.en: I'm in Love with the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 我的首推是恶役大小姐

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的首推是惡役大小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shǒutuī shì è yì dà xiǎojiě

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Oshi wa Akuyaku Reijou.

altTitles.es-la: Mi Oshi Es Una Villa Noble

description.de:
Oohashi Rei - eigentlich eine ganz normale Büroangestellte - wacht eines Tages im Körper der Protagonistin ihres absoluten Lieblingsspiels "Revolution" auf. Eigentlich geht es in dem Spiel darum, mit einem von drei absolut wundervollen Prinzen zusammenzukommen. Ein klassisches Otome-Game, und wenn es nach Rei geht, auch das mit Abstand beste.  
Ihr Hauptinteresse lag dabei jedoch nicht etwa an einem der männlichen Charaktere, sondern an Claire François, der Antagonistin des Spiels.

Wird Rei es schaffen, eine romantische Beziehung zu ihr aufzubauen? Wie werden die eigentlichen Stars des Spiels, die drei Prinzen, auf diese Situation reagieren?  
Und was hält Claire überhaupt davon?
description.en:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
description.fr:
Rei Ôhashi, une simple employée de bureau d’une petite entreprise, se retrouve soudainement dans le corps de l’héroïne de son jeu vidéo de drague préféré, Revolution.
Maintenant sous le nom de Rae Taylor, elle est prête à accomplir son objectif.
Passer du bon temps avec les princes du jeu ? Non.
Son cœur appartient à la méchante de l’histoire, Claire François.
Bien décidée à la chérir et à rester à ses côtés, sa nouvelle vie commence dans un monde empreint de magie !
description.id: Seorang pegawai kantor biasa, Oohashi Rei, bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang Heroine bernama Rei Taylor di Game Otome favoritnya, "Revolution". Kebetulan lagi, orang pertama yang menyambutnya adalah karakter favoritnya, Claire Francois- antagonis dari cerita ini! Kini Rei bertekad untuk membangun hubungan romantis dengan Claire, bukan dengan pemeran utama pria. Lantas, bagaimanakah gadis jahat yang dia cintai akan bereaksi terhadap kemesraan baru ini?!
description.it:
La normale impiegata Oohashi Rei si sveglia nel corpo della protagonista del suo gioco otome preferito, Revolution. Per la sua gioia, la prima persona che incontra è anche il suo personaggio preferito, Claire François, l'antagonista principale della storia! Ora Rei è determinata a perseguire una storia d'amore con Claire piuttosto che con gli interessi amorosi maschili. Ma come reagirà la sua amata antagonista a questo nuovo corteggiamento?!
L'anime debutterà ad ottobre 2023!
Annunciato il manga ufficiale italiano!
description.ja: 乙女ゲーム『Revolution』の世界に、ヒロインのレイ＝テイラーとして転生した社畜OL・大橋零。そんな彼女の推しは攻略対象の王子たち…ではなく、悪役令嬢・クレア＝フランソワだった!　前世でゲームをやりこんでいたレイは、その知識と愛で、クレアとお近づきになることができるのか？
description.es-la: Oohashi Rei, una trabajadora de oficina ordinaria se despierta en el cuerpo de la protagonista de su juego otome favorito, "Revolution". Para su deleite, la primera persona en saludarla es también su personaje favorito, Claire Francois, ¡la principal antagonista de la historia! Ahora, Rei está decidida a enamorarse de Claire en lugar de los protagonistas masculinos del juego. ¿Pero cómo reaccionará la villana ante este nuevo cortejo?

description.en:
Taichi Hiraga-Keaton, who has a Japanese father and an English mother, works as an insurance op (investigator) while teaching archaeology at a university.
He is also a former instructor of survival techniques in the SAS (Special Air Service) of the British army.

Keaton's dream is to work as an archaeologist to discover the mysterious Danube civilization.

In reality, however, he spends his days doing detective work, which is always fraught with danger.

When he is thrown out into the desert, he uses his knowledge as a weapon to survive, and he uses chocolate to disable a bomb planted by terrorists.

He is supported by his daughter Yuriko, who scolds Keaton for his clumsiness, his father Taihei, who is still thriving in his old age, and his partner Daniel, an insurance investigator, while still feeling regret over his ex-wife.



---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/master-keaton)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (cancelled)
description.es-la:
Keaton es el hijo de una mujer inglesa de noble cuna y un zoólogo japonés.Se fue a Inglaterra a la edad de cinco años con su madre después del divorcio de sus padres.

Allí aprendió arqueología en la Universidad de Oxford, donde conoció a su mujer con la que tiene una hija (Yuriko), de la que se divorciaron cinco años después.
Trabaja como operativo/detective para Lloyds de Londres donde es conocido por sus habilidades adquiridas como sargento mayor en el SAS y como veterano de la Guerra de las Malvinas, lo que le ayuda a llevar a cabo su peligrosa labor de investigador de seguros.
A pesar de trabajar para Lloyds, su sueño es excavar la antigua civilización en una cuenca del Danubio.
___
* Su título es "maestro" porque el maestro del campo de entrenamiento de SAS le dijo que no podría ser un "profesor" en su estilo de lucha pero un "maestro" en el mejor de los casos.
* El manga retrata muchas facetas de Keaton: no solo su papel como detective, sino también sus puntos de vista humanistas sobre la naturaleza, la familia y la cultura.
description.pt-br:
Taichi Hiraga-Keaton, que tem um pai japonês e uma mãe inglesa, trabalha como investigador de seguros enquanto leciona arqueologia em uma universidade. Ele também é um ex-instrutor de técnicas de sobrevivência no SAS (Serviço Aéreo Especial) do exército britânico.

O sonho de Keaton é trabalhar como arqueólogo para descobrir a misteriosa civilização do Danúbio.

Na realidade, porém, ele passa seus dias fazendo trabalho de detetive, que sempre está repleto de perigos.

Quando é jogado no deserto, ele usa seu conhecimento como uma arma para sobreviver e utiliza chocolate para desativar uma bomba plantada por terroristas.

Ele é apoiado por sua filha Yuriko, que repreende Keaton por sua falta de jeito, seu pai Taihei, que ainda está florescente em sua velhice, e seu parceiro Daniel, um investigador de seguros, enquanto ainda sente arrependimento por sua ex-esposa.

altTitles.ja: しゅがー・みーつ・がーる！

description.en:
A Sweet and Juicy Girls' Comedy~

Featuring:

Sato Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss, she's known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance.

And Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady.

Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls found out about each other!?

Takase is the opposite of his brother. He's weaker and struggles in school. He recently moved into his married brother's house in order to receive coaching to improve his physical health. The coach, also known as the "Venus of Track," is none other than his sister-in-law. The Venus of Track is researching and developing a new technique to improve male performance by testosterone management. In other words, manipulation of sexual desire. She has dubbed it "Absolute Obedience" and Takase must undergo it to improve himself. Takase's life is in for a dramatic change…
description.ja: 陸上部でパッとしない成績の高校生・浩太は、かつて“トラックのビーナス”と呼ばれていた義姉の恭子にコーチを依頼することに。ところが彼女が提案してきたのは、思いもよらないトレーニング方法だった……！！　性欲をガマンすることで一流の陸上選手を目指す、史上初・禁欲トレーニング＝略して禁トレコメディ！！
description.es-la: Takase es todo lo contrario a su hermano. Es más débil y tiene dificultades en la escuela. Recientemente se ha mudado a la casa de su hermano casado para recibir entrenamiento para mejorar su salud física. La entrenadora, también conocida como la "Venus del Atletismo", no es otra que su cuñada. La Venus del Atletismo está investigando y desarrollando una nueva técnica para mejorar el rendimiento masculino mediante la gestión de la testosterona. En otras palabras, la manipulación del deseo sexual. Ella la ha bautizado como "Obediencia Absoluta" y Takase debe someterse a ella para mejorar. La vida de Takase está abocada a un cambio drástico...
description.pt-br: Takase é o oposto de seu irmão. Ele é mais fraco e briga na escola. Ele recentemente se mudou para a casa de seu irmão casado para receber treinamento para melhorar sua saúde física. A treinadora, também conhecido como a "Vênus da Pista", não é outra senão sua cunhada. A Vênus da Pista está pesquisando e desenvolvendo uma nova técnica para melhorar o desempenho masculino através do controle de testosterona. Em outras palavras, manipulação do desejo sexual. Ela o apelidou de "Obediência Absoluta" e Takase deve passar por isso para melhorar a si mesmo. A vida de Takase está prestes a sofrer uma mudança dramática...

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!

altTitles.es-la: Harén del Fin del Mundo - Fantasía

altTitles.ja: 終末のハーレム ファンタジア

description.en: It's year 998, and the world has been corrupted by darkness. The next head of the small border kingdom of Nagara, Ark, has feelings for his cousin, Aurelia, but a political marriage to the Crown Prince has separated them. In order to get her back, Ark desires immense power, but a mysterious dark elf, Rati, appears in front of him.  In exchange for a promise, she will give him "the power to rule the world." An erotic and dark fantasy begins!
description.ja: 聖暦998年。そこはまもなく終末を迎える闇に蝕まれた世界。辺境の小国ナーガラの次期当主・アルクは従姉のアウレリアと両想いだったが、皇太子との政略結婚のため引き離されてしまった。彼女を取り戻そうと強力な力を欲するアルクの前に現れた謎のダークエルフ・ラティ。ラティからある約束と引き換えに“この世を統べることができる力”を授けると告げられたアルクは――。エロティック＆ダークファンタジー開幕!!
description.es-la: Es el año 998, y el mundo ha sido corrompido por la oscuridad. El próximo jefe del pequeño reino fronterizo de Nagara, Alk, siente algo por su prima Aurelia, pero un matrimonio político con el príncipe heredero los ha separado. Para recuperarla, Alk anhela un inmenso poder, pero la misteriosa elfa oscura Rati aparece ante él.  A cambio de una promesa, ella le dará "el poder de gobernar el mundo". ¡Comienza una fantasía erótica y oscura!

altTitles.es-la: El harén del fin del mundo

description.en: The Man-Killer Virus: a lethal disease that has eradicated 99.9% of the world's male population. Mizuhara Reito has been in cryogenic sleep for the past five years, leaving behind Tachibana Erisa, the girl of his dreams. When Reito awakens from the deep freeze, he emerges into a sex-crazed new world where he himself is the planet's most precious resource. Reito and four other male studs are given lives of luxury and one simple mission: repopulate the world by impregnating as many women as possible! All Reito wants, however, is to find his beloved Erisa who went missing three years ago. Can Reito resist temptation and find his one true love?
description.ja: 時は2040年。難病に侵された青年・怜人は幼馴染の絵理沙と再会を誓い、病を治すためコールドスリープする。そして5年後――。目覚めた怜人を待っていたのは99.9%の男が死滅し50億人の女性が生きる世界だった…！　近未来エロティックサスペンス開幕！
description.es-la: El virus mata a los hombres: una enfermedad letal que ha erradicado el 99,9% de la población masculina del mundo. Mizuhara Reito ha estado en sueño criogénico durante los últimos cinco años, dejando atrás a Tachibana Erisa, la chica de sus sueños. Cuando Reito despierta del congelamiento, emerge en un nuevo mundo loco por el sexo donde él mismo es el recurso más preciado del planeta. Reito y otros cuatro sementales masculinos reciben vidas de lujo y una simple misión: ¡repoblar el mundo impregnando a tantas mujeres como sea posible! Sin embargo, todo lo que Reito quiere es encontrar a su amada Erisa, que desapareció hace tres años. ¿Puede Reito resistir la tentación y encontrar a su único y verdadero amor?

title.en: Gyaru to Nekura no Kyuuketsu Kankei

altTitles.ja: ギャルとネクラの吸血関係

altTitles.en: The Bloody Relationship Between Nekura and Gal

description.en: Fake gyaru Hadekawa Iyone failed her gyaru debut  in high school, but trying to break away from her situation as an outcast, tried talking to her seat neighbor, Chisui Makuru, who turned out to be the vampire rumored about in town! Although, Makuru isn't the typical vampire everyone imagines... And thus begins the slightly strange high school life of a gyaru in search of friends, and a vampire in search of an underling.

The unemployed Chiaki is the eldest of three brothers.  
With no parents, he starts job hunting to support his two younger brothers.  
Chiaki witnesses a young woman being sexually assaulted and tries to help, 
without knowing that this behavior would change his destiny.  


---
description.ru: Безработный молодой человек Чиаки является старшим братом в семье. Будучи без родителей, он начал поиски работы, чтобы поддержать двух младших братьев.И вот однажды, наконец, добившись финального собеседования, Чиаки стал свидетелем извращенца. Невольно попытавшись помочь, он даже не догадывался, что подобное поведение изменит его судьбу.
description.pt-br: Chiaki, um jovem desempregado, e o irmão mais velho dentre os 3 irmãos, sem pais, ele começou a procurar emprego para ajudar a sustentar seus dois irmãos mais novos. Um dia, quando finalmente consegue uma entrevista, Chiaki avista um pervertido e involuntariamente tenta ajudar sem saber que essa ação mudaria o seu destino drasticamente.

title.en: To Love Ru - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: To LOVEる―とらぶる― カラー版

description.en: Rito is a high-school boy who just can't confess to the girl of his dreams, Haruna-chan. One day when coming home and sulking in the bath-tub, a mysterious and barely clothed girl appears out of nowhere. Her name is Lala and she comes from another planet…
description.es-la: Yuuki Rito es el estudiante promedio de secundaria: torpe, tímido y desesperado cuando se trata de confesar sus sentimientos a la chica de sus sueños. ¡Pero un día, una princesa alienígena que huye aparece de repente en su bañera! Cuando Rito se compromete con la hermosa Lala después de un malentendido, se ve envuelto en el caos de la política extraterrestre, los pretendientes alienígenas rivales y la hilaridad del harén.

altTitles.ja: 女魔王様はゆうしゃくんを倒せない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Maou-sama wa Yuusha-kun wo Taosenai.

altTitles.en: The Demon Queen Can't Defeat Yuusha-kun.

description.en:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!?
___
Produced with the help of and supervised by [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline).
description.pt-br: A Rainha Demônio Abyss está preocupada... ela não é capaz de derrotar o herói, considerado o inimigo mortal dos demônio. Esse herói ainda é um jovem inexperiente — ele deveria ser fácil de derrotar! ... Todavia, o problema é que ele, não conhecendo a verdadeira identidade de Abyss, a considera sua "Mestra" e gosta muito dela...!?

title.en: Avenger of Mystical Eyes - Blood Parasite

altTitles.ja: 魔眼の復讐者 ブラッドパラサイト

description.en: "Would you like to be part of my family?" Archive, the devil race's weakest, was saved by the Demon Queen right before death overtook him. Unable to have children and capable of harming anything that approaches him, Archive is the only member of the Demon Queen's "family" that continues living. However, demons and humans hate each other, and they are fighting wars at the cost of each other's peace. Eight heroes lure the Demon Queen with promises of peace to defeat her. Archive could only stand by and watch as the weakened Demon Queen fell into the trap and then abused. Archive goes to help, but as the weakest demon, he has no way to fight back and meets his end as his head was severed from his body. The Demon Queen is then sealed away. Unable to protect the Demon Queen, Archive used every ounce of his strength to cast a certain spell on one of the eight heroes, Lieselotte. [Forbidden magic that kills and takes over the soul of a fetus called Blood Parasite]. By using this magic, Archive managed to take over Lieselotte's fetus, as she was already pregnant. Reborn from the weakest demon into the son of a hero, Archive would eventually display "Demon eyes." Petrification, Charm, Fear, Clairvoyance, along with other powers that became available to Archive, who had obtained the most powerful demon eyes. Archive vows revenge on the heroes, even if it was his own mother who gave birth to him, or the lover who loved him when he was a teenager. “Just you wait, heroes, I shall kill you and take back the Demon Queen!”

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?

altTitles.pl: Dlaczego Masz Obsesję na Punkcie Swojej Fałszywej Żony?

description.en:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?
description.ko:
“내 아내로 인정받을 망상 따위 꿈에도 하지 않는 게 좋을 거다. 내가 발라지트의 딸에게서 후사를 볼 일은 영영 없을 테니.”

나디아는 하마터면 나도 같은 생각이라고 맞장구칠 뻔했다.

감사합니다, 후작놈아.
자기 입으로 한 말은 꼭 지키세요.

***

“후작님께서 저와 합방을 할 의사가 없다고 하셨거든요.”
“…….”
“그러니 후계를 위해선 어쩔 수 없이 첩을 들이는 수밖에…….”

콰직.
무언가 으스러지는 소리에 나디아의 고개가 홱 돌아갔다.
그러자 남편이 짚은 테이블의 한 구석에 금이 간 모습이 보인다.

아니, 저게 갑자기 왜 부서져?
description.pl:
"Lepiej, żebyś nie marzyła o uznaniu cię za moją żonę. Nigdy nie miałbym następcy z córką Balazita".
Słysząc to, Nadia prawie powiedziała: "Czuję to samo".
Dziękuję ci, markizie. Mam nadzieję, że dotrzymasz swoich słów.
***
"Powiedziałeś, że nie masz zamiaru dzielić ze mną łoża".
"..."
"Więc dla dobra następcy wiem, że nie masz innego wyboru, jak sprowadzić konkubinę..."
pęknięcie
Głowa Nadii odwróciła się na ten dźwięk.
W następnej chwili widzi, pęknięcie w rogu stołu, przy którym był jej mąż.
To znaczy, dlaczego ten stół nagle się złamał?

description.en:
At the turn of the previous century, the earth quaked. The earth's crust began to shift for the fourth time, centering around the coast of the Atlantic Ocean. The entire world's land mass was reduced to 3/5 of the planet, and the human population was reduced by a third. Put simply…the earth had gotten old. In 2039, there was only one country that continued to prosper, glaring around at the rest of the dying planet: Japan.  
  
Todoroki Jin returns to Tokyo, the city where he was born, in hopes of finding his friend Ryoma. Little does Jin know about how Tokyo's changed since his last visit…  
  
The oneshot at the end of volume 3 is called **Warrior of the Holy Flame, Abi**.  
  
Recommended for fans of [Riki-Oh](https://mangadex.org/manga/3710/)

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

I may be a witch who is over 300 years old, but I died by the hand of the human I trusted. I thought I’d be stuck in the soul world, but I reincarnated as a princess of a Royal Palace where we kill each other. Since it became like this, in any case, I should become the Queen. “You. Be my subordinate.” I thought everyone would be afraid of me if I did this. “Can’t I touch it once? Everyone would be jealous of me because I patted your head once.” …What nonsense is this?“ Again. Do it again, since it’s cute.” But they’ve started to show me so much affection to the point that they seemed to have all gone mad as a group. …I’ll be able to become the Queen, right?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10170/)
description.ko:
나는 삼백 살이 넘는 마녀이지만, 믿었던 인간에게 배신당해 죽었다.
꼼짝없이 영혼계에 붙잡혀 있을 줄 알았는데 
서로가 서로를 죽이는 황실에 황녀로 환생했다.

이렇게 된 이상 내가 황제가 돼야겠다. 
“너. 내 부하가 대라.”

이렇게 했으니까 모두 나를 두려워하겠지, 생각했는데.

“한 번만 만져주면 안 돼? 네가 머리를 쓰다듬어줬다고 하면 모두가 부러워할 거야.”
…뭐야. 왜 이래. 

“더 해 줘. 귀여우니까.”
description.zh: 因被背叛而致死的魔女，在积蓄力量等待复活时，穿越成了以互相残杀，争夺皇位为铁律的皇室公主。 正准备惨烈地加入皇位争夺时，身边的人却反常地迷恋上我？ “太可爱了，能摸我一下吗？只要你抚摸一下我的头，所有人都会羡慕死我的。”

title.en: The Baby Saint Wants to Destroy the World!

description.en:
The perpetual cycle of reincarnation, the recurring tragic deaths. Lucyphela, a formidable witch who became tired of life after enduring 99 lifetimes. She aims to halt the cycle by causing the world's demise.

Nevertheless...
Upon awakening, she discovers her rebirth as the 'Baby Saint,' fated to rescue this world?

Nurtured by the very priests who were formerly her adversaries.
Menaced by former companions who were once her apprentices!

Can the Baby Saint provoke the world's ruin unscathed?

altTitles.en: Monster Princess of the Snowy Mountain

description.en: Valerie Bellov is exiled to the frozen mountains as punishment for her mother's sin. There, she gains the freezing ability of a monster that terrified the Empire in the past. On her 19th birthday, she takes her life by her own hands, only to wake up and find herself back in her childhood at the age of 9. In order to change the past, Valerie seeks to meet her stepbrother, Emperor Millard, who exiled her.

title.en: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins

description.en:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

“I want Miss Popo to be my siblings’ tutor.”

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devil’s temptation shook Sarah’s life.
description.ko:
전생엔 초등교사, 현생엔 가정교사.
인생 2회 차인 세라 포포는 전생의 경험을 살려
귀족 자제들을 대상으로 고액 가정교사 일을 하는 중이었다.
목표는 건물주!

그러던 어느 날,
제국의 황제가 찾아왔다.

“포포 양께서 제 동생들의 가정교사를 맡아주면 좋겠어요.”

물 폭탄, 밀가루 폭탄, 벌레 공격 등
온갖 악질 장난은 다 한다고 악명이 자자한 쌍둥이 전하들의
가정교사가 되어 달라는 무시무시한 제안을 하기 위해!

달콤하기 짝이 없는 고액을 곁들인,
그 악마의 제안이 세라의 인생을 뒤흔들었다.

#환생물 #육아물
#전생도 현생도 교사 여주
#육아지옥에 빠진 황제 남주

description.en:
Videogames x Showa Culture x Glamour! A voluptuous and fascinating book for those that enjoy the Showa Era and playing video games! A large collection of stories, published in Harta by Benitsubaki's author, Takahashi Hirona, all in one volume!

Two glamorous folk tales, including "Glamorous-suteyama", a glamorous rearrangement of the Ubasuteyama legend!
When a witch fostering a planet sprays it with some water, torrential rains begin to pour from above in "My first planet"
"Shiramari" is a super idol whose singing voice makes people so happy they could die!
And of course, the series of 16 shorts "It's okay to play games", the antithesis of being given a cold look while you're playing video games!

Full of bright, fantastical ideas, all these gems from Harta's new wave, Takahashi Hirona, in a single volume!

title.en: That Villain's Life, I'll Live It Once

altTitles.ko: 그 악녀 인생, 제가 한번 살아 볼게요

altTitles.en: The Villainess's Life, I'll Try Living It
I Will Live the Life of a Villainess

description.en:
On her way home, the protagonist, Jung Yuna, gets into a traffic accident.
And just when she thought she had died... she opens her eyes to find herself in a splendid bedroom?!

Observing for about a week, she realizes that the person she has possessed was the notorious villainess from the novel she had read before her death, "The Lady of the White Rose."

Not only that, but she was the ultimate villainess who only did wicked things to the heroine and ended up dying at the hands of the male lead!
Can Elena successfully avoid her novel's fate?

Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

altTitles.th: นโปเลียน ยอดนักรัก

altTitles.ja: 栄光のナポレオン - エロイカ

description.en:
The direct sequel to Rose of Versailles.

It tells the story of Napoleon's empire, including the Thermidorian Reaction, the Italian Campaign, the Syrian Campaign, the Battle of the Nile and the coup of 18 Brumaire, and the French invasion of Russia.

title.en: Touhou Ibara Kasen ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.en: Eastern Thorned Poet Hermit ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.ru: Тохо Ибаракасэн ~ Дикий и Рогатый Отшельник

altTitles.ja: 東方茨歌仙　～ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.de: Der Rosenpoet des Ostens ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.uk: Тохо Ібаракасен ~ Дика та Рогата Відлюдниця

description.en:
In this 10 volume official Touhou series, spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games, we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame, who meet a mysterious, young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.  
  
Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business, she decides to become a regular shrine visitor, determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden, in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging, yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice, or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?
description.pt:
De Zun, Wild and Horned Hermit é o último mangá da série Touhou, seguindo os passos de Silent Sinner in Blue, Inaba the Moon & Inaba the Earth e a triologia Sangetsusei.  
Desta vez, Marisa encontra uma misteriosa eremita fora da aldeia humana, No entanto, ela contou para Reimu sobre essa mulher, sendo vista ao redor do Santuário, ela é Ibara Kasen, uma estranha asceta com um braço enfaixado por causa de uma certa habilidade desconhecida da natureza, cujo mantem uma disciplina mais consciente do que elas e de qualquer um em Gensokyo.

description.en:
Born as a genius among geniuses in Herbal Medicine, I've undergone countless reincarnations, all at the request of the Gods! I can't stop until I create the perfect Divine Elixir... 

Isn’t this a scam? In the end, in this current life, I declared a strike. 

I’m not going to do it! No, I won’t work!!!

"I'm counting on you."
"Me? Are you serious?!"
Surprisingly, my strained family relationships seem to be improving. 

"Thank you so much!"
I'm receiving expressions of gratitude from all over the place. And to top it off…

"A long-lost disciple came to see you."
My first, and also my last, disciple appeared in front of me. 

Why didn’t he die?
Spin-off focused on Kawase Ryoko disguising herself as a boy and joining her high school's men's baseball club

altTitles.ja: お求め頂いた暴君陛下の悪女です

description.en: If I accepted his offer and became his Empress at that time, would I be able to live a little longer? I don’t know but if I had I wouldn’t have felt that pain of dislocating my eye but only when I went 10 years back and stood next to him I realized he fell when I fell we were so much alike which is why he contacted me.

altTitles.th: รีเทิร์น ทู เพลย์เยอร์

altTitles.ja: リターン・トゥ・プレイヤー

description.en:
Ten years ago, a group of gods turned everyone on Earth into players of a sadistic game that forced them to kill monsters in real life -- or be killed themselves. Sehan Kim has already seen how this game will play out: everyone in the world dies except for him. When he’s given the chance to go back in time and start a second playthrough, Sehan is determined to change the course of events and beat the gods at their own game.

---

description.fr:
Un jour, le monde est devenu un jeu. Les monstres qui apparaissent soudainement tuent des gens, et les gens doivent devenir des joueurs et terminer la quête ! Kim Se-han est revenu de la fin de l'humanité et c'est à présent sa deuxième partie en tant que joueur. Sera-t-il capable de détruire le «système» qui a mis fin au monde ?

Dunia telah berubah menjadi game! Setelah 10 tahun, Sehan berhasil menyelesaikan segalanya. Tetapi, ia memilih untuk memulai permainan dari awal dan menjalaninya lagi. Bisakah ia menyelamatkan dunia dan menghancurkan sistem yang membuat dunia berubah itu?

어느 날, 게임이 되어버린 세상.
갑자기 나타난 몬스터들이 사람들을 죽이고, 사람들은 플레이어가 되어 퀘스트를 달성해야 한다!
인류의 종말에서 회귀한 2회차 플레이어, 김세한.

В один день мир превратился в игру. Неожиданно появившиеся монстры стали убивать людей, а те в свою очередь были вынуждены начать выполнять различные квесты. Во всём этом хаосе апокалипсиса выделился игрок по имени Ким Сехан. Удастся ли ему найти и уничтожить систему, сделавшую мир таким?

เมื่อ 10 ปีก่อนโลกใบนี้ได้กลายมาเป็นฉากของ 'เกม' พวกเราได้กลายมาเป็น 'ผู้เล่น' ของเกมนั้นและต้องฆ่ามอนสเตอร์เพื่อเอาชีวิตรอด และผลลัพธ์คือ...การล่มสลายของมนุษยชาติ

游戏通关后结局竟是，
人类已灭亡？！
怪物肆虐，人类被迫成为游戏玩家。当游戏结束时世界只剩我一个幸存者，还被系统告知——单人模式结束，DLC商店开启。我竟然回到了游戏的第一天！
一切都可以重新再来，这次我将改变结局！

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)
description.ko:
진 룬칸델
대륙 최고의 검술명가, 룬칸델의 막내아들
룬칸델 역사상 최악의 둔재

비참하게 쫓겨나 허무한 최후를 맞이한 그에게
다시 한 번 기회가 주어졌다.

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”
“저를 위해 사용하고 싶습니다.”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약

최강이 될 준비는 끝났다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)

description.en:
In a world where the Han Empire never fell, martial arts is a power used to squeeze the people dry. So when a new continent is discovered, both good and evil men alike flee to settle there and escape the tyranny of the Emperor, opening up the era of a Martial Wild West.

In the turbulent frontier, Zhang Qian is a man that reincarnated from our cushy, modern world, but his new world is nothing like the fantastical world he dreamed about from reading martial arts novels. While the martial arts in his new world are powerful, they are also too crude and lack elegance. And so Qian journeys the new continent for his dream of bringing true martial arts back to the new martial realm.
description.pt-br: Em um mundo que o Império Han nunca caiu, artes marciais são um poder usado para oprimir as pessoas. Então quando um novo continente é descoberto, tanto os bons quanto os maus fogem para se estabelecer e fugir da tirania do Imperador, dando início a era do Oeste Selvagem Marcial. Na turbulenta fronteira, Zhang Qian é um homem que reencarnou do nosso mundo moderno e confortável, mas seu novo ambiente não é nada como o mundo fantasioso com o qual ele sonhava ao ler novels de artes marciais. Enquanto as artes marciais em seu novo mundo são poderosas, elas também são grosseiras demais e não tem elegância. E assim Qian começa sua jornada pelo continente pelo sonho de trazer as artes marciais de verdade para o novo reino marcial.

description.en:
Power struggles, dark struggles, and betrayal in Hell 58, the island of the Yak-Kang-sik.  
Can the protagonist common people find hope and escape from this hellish island?  
  
 [Official Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/hell-58/list?title_no=1553&page=1)

Im Dajun is a high school student who gets bullied at school every day. He came across an interview on TV just when he was on the verge of giving up on life. It was with a murderer who killed the classmates that bullied him. Dajun becomes inspired by what he saw and decides to take revenge as well.

His revenge was successful. However, his life steered into an undesired direction. Im Dajun, leaving school, ends up joining a strange Runaway Fam.

The young runaway, Im Dajun, no longer suffers from the bullies at his school. Instead, he now must survive against even more vicious thugs on the streets.

---

description.ko:
고등학생 임다준은 학교에서 늘상 괴롭힘을 당하는 게 일상이었다. 삶을 포기하기 직전 우연히 본 티비 속 동급생 살해범의 인터뷰에 감명을 받고 복수를 결심하게 된다.
복수는 성공했지만 삶은 원치않는 방향으로 흘러가게 되고.. 학교에서 나온 임다준은 범상치않은 가출팸에 들어가게 된다.
가출청소년 임다준은 더이상 학교 안 일진들에게 시달리지 않게 되었지만 그보다 잔혹한 길거리의 양아치들을 상대로 살아남아야만 한다.

삶의 끝자락에 내몰린 고등학생 임다준의 길거리 생존기!

---

description.zh:
懦弱少年复仇后无家可归，
残酷的街头生存挑战开始！
男主任多骏经常被欺负。在他想要寻短见的那一刻，偶然看到电视里的一段采访，感触颇深，决定报仇。而后虽然复仇成功，但他的人生却也朝着无法预测的方向发展。被父亲赶出家门的他开始街头流浪，必须要面对更残酷的街头混混生活。被逼上绝路的他能否生存下来呢？

---

description.zh-hk:
高中生林多俊每天在學校遭受以李道允為首的不良學生們的霸凌，在他想結束自己的生命以解脫的前一晚，偶然在電視上看到殺害多名霸凌者的高中生的訪問，而萌生報仇的念頭。某次又受到李道允的霸凌時，他將道允推向衝來的貨車。在看似成功的復仇之後，席捲而來的是....？

title.en: The Chaotic God of Extraordinary Strength

description.en:
Zheng, the ‘Slaughtering Scythe Ghost’ who finds pleasure in killing.

He happens to have the exact same face as the Third Young Master of the Great Orderly Wooden Sword Hall, Mok Gyung-Woon…
“Become my body double. That way, I’ll let you out of this prison.”

“Will you give me that opportunity?”
‘Crack-!!!’
He kills the Third Young Master and decides to become the ‘real’ one. Can the fake Mok Gyung-Woon survive as the real one? The serial killer begins his new life as the Third Young Master of the Great Orderly Wooden Sword Hall.

The so-called “Lighthouse of the North,” the prosperous trading town of Schoarra, hides a dark underbelly: seedy slums ruled by five ruthless crime bosses.

When streetwise orphan Vlad finds the brothel he works for decimated by a disgraced knight, he turns to the path of the blade, pledging himself to the pursuit of power by sword. 

Blessed with the ability to seek wisdom from his sentient sword, Vlad embarks upon a journey of growth and peril as swordsman in service to the powerful House Vayezid.

description.en: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past...except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!
description.ja:
中学時代のトラウマをきっかけに高校デビューに成功した元陰キャの志月恵助。
新しい環境で過去の自分を知る者はいない。ただ一人、同じ中学出身で
恵助と同様に高校デビューを果たした女子・楠木静を除いて…。

---
Chūgaku jidai no torauma o kikkake ni kōkō debyū ni seikō shita moto in kya no shitsuki keisuke. Atarashī kankyō de kako no jibun o shiru mono wa inai. Tadahitori, onaji chūgaku shusshin de keisuke to dōyō ni kōkō debyū o hatashita joshi Kusunoki Shizuka o nozoite….

description.en: A peek into the "everyday nudity" of high school girls. Virgins’ Empire is a look into the lives of seven high school girls attending an all girls school. We follow them as they grow relationships with one another. Some more intimate than others.

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

description.en: Because of mysterious human-eating creatures named “Arnis”, humanity has gone near extinct. In order to meet his close friend Nika, a 16 years old boy Evan enlists himself in platoon Able, an army that has obtained supernatural abilities with the materials they gained from Arnis. And the world, which to some is the past, some is the future, some is the present, starts to move.

description.en:
This is no different from ordinary villager life...
"There can be no one stronger than me in this world!"
To become the strongest, Yuria, the Sea Queen, went ashore in search of the Demon King. But when she looked at her reflection, she saw the face of a child. In exchange for her legs, she lost all her strength... Even so, still striving to become the strongest, Yuria begins a painful journey!

description.id:
[ "Hanya saja... aku jadi tidak ada bedanya dengan penduduk desa..." ] "Tidak boleh ada makhluk yang lebih kuat dariku di dunia ini!" Untuk menjadi yang terkuat, Yuria, Raja Lautan, datang ke daratan untuk mencari Raja Iblis terkuat. Namun, saat melihat ke cermin, dia melihat wajah anak kecil...? Sebagai ganti kaki, dia telah kehilangan seluruh kekuatannya. Meskipun begitu, ia masih mengincar posisi teratas di dunia! Perjalanannya yang penuh air mata dimulai!

["이건 그냥… 마을 사람 A랑 다를게 없잖아…"]

"나보다 강한 존재는 이 세계에 있을 수 없어!"
세계관 최강자 자리를 위해 지상최강 "마왕"을 찾아
뭍으로 나온 바다의 왕 "유리아" 

그런데… 거울을 보니 웬 어린아이가…?
다리를 얻음과 동시에 
그녀의 모든 힘이 사라져 버렸다...

그럼에도 여전히 세계최강 자리를 노리고 있는
 그녀의 눈물겨운 여정이 시작된다!!

description.ru:
Это… Ничем не отличается от деревенской жизни... В этом мире не может быть существа сильнее меня!” Чтобы стать сильнейшей, Юрия, Морская Королева, вышла на сушу в поисках Короля Демонов. Но… Посмотрев на свое отражение, она увидела лицо ребенка... В обмен на ноги она потеряла все свои силы... Даже так, все еще стремясь стать сильнейшей, начинается мучительное путешествие Юрии!

description.zh:
深海女王无奈变成小孩？
落魄海王的陆地称霸之旅！
大海之王友丽亚为了称霸天下，特地上岸来到陆地上寻找魔王一决胜负。可上岸后才发现，自己失去了所有的力量，而且还变成了小孩子？为了称霸天下，友丽亚辛酸的崭新旅程就此拉开帷幕！

description.en: Teenage magician Kaito Kuroba has a secret identity: that of Kaitou Kid, a famous internationally-known and wanted "phantom thief". Kaito took the identity after one day discovering that his late father was the original Kaitou Kid. Later on, he discovers his father, who died from an 'accident' during a magic trick, was really murdered because he would not steal the jewel Pandora for an evil organization. As Kaitou Kid, Kaito tries to find Pandora before that organization that killed his father do, and destroy it, leading Inspector Nakamori and his taskforce on the wildest jewel heists imaginable!
description.ja: 世紀の宝物を予告通りに手中し、闇から闇へと消え去る紳士・怪盗キッド！！見事なマジックで名刑事らの裏をかき、目指すは「正義」の完全犯罪！！今宵、神出鬼没の彼が狙う宝石は、時価4億円の「月の瞳」だ！！

Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？
